ComicInfo.Title: Joel Beck's Little Theatre of the North; A Most En-Lightening Experience; Mr. Natural's School of Wisdom; Mickey Mouse Today!

ComicInfo.Summary:
Because he's out of money, Mr. Natural tries to start a school
The professor tries to become an artist in this send-up of the fine art scene.
